SECTION.DEVELOPMENT_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Configure settings for debugging and development.
SECTION.FADER_BEHAVIOR_DESCRIPTION: Configure what the faders control & show during playback. Note: Album control does only work for certain services. Playlist, Queue are not implemented yet

BUTTON.DOC_CALIBRATE: Calibrates all faders. View the logs for the results

GENERAL.DOC_MESSAGE_DELAY: The delay between fader controller midi messages in seconds.
GENERAL.DOC_CALIBRATION_ON_START: Enable or disable calibration on startup.
GENERAL.DOC_SPEED_HIGH: Set the high speed for fader movement.
GENERAL.DOC_SPEED_MEDIUM: Set the medium speed for fader movement.
GENERAL.DOC_SPEED_LOW: Set the low speed for fader movement.
GENERAL.DOC_SERIAL_PORT: Specify the serial port for communication.
GENERAL.DOC_BAUD_RATE: Specify the baud rate for serial communication.
GENERAL.DOC_UPDATE_SEEK_ON_MOVE: Enable or disable seek updates while touching the fader.
GENERAL.DOC_UPDATE_VOLUME_ON_MOVE: Enable or disable volume updates while touching the fader.

LOGGING.DOC_MIDI_LOG: Enable logging of MIDI data received by the fader controller.
LOGGING.DOC_VALUE_LOG: Enable logging of value changes during fader operation.
LOGGING.DOC_MOVE_LOG: Enable logging of physical fader movements.
LOGGING.DOC_LOG_LEVEL: Set the log level for the fader controller.

DEV_SETTINGS.DOC_VOLUMIO_HOST: Specify the Volumio host for connection.
DEV_SETTINGS.DOC_VOLUMIO_PORT: Specify the Volumio port for connection.
DEV_SETTINGS.DOC_STATE_UPDATE_INTERVAL: Deprecated, we avoid ussing contious state updates. 1000ms matches the ui playback refreshrate
DEV_SETTINGS.DOC_FADER_REALTIME_SEEK_INTERVAL: Set the interval for realtime seek in milliseconds.1000ms matches the ui playback refreshrate
DEV_SETTINGS.DOC_DEBUG_MODE: Enable/Disable Logging in debugging mode. This will log more verbose and slow down timings

FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_BEHAVIOR: Configure which functions the faders are assigned to
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_TRIM: Set trims for the fader. This will map all values to this range. Use this to avoid overshoot and rattling at the end positions
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_0_OUTPUT: Select the output behavior for Fader 0.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_0_INPUT: Select the input behavior for Fader 0.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_0_SEEK_TYPE: Select the seek type for Fader 0.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_1_OUTPUT: Select the output behavior for Fader 1.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_1_INPUT: Select the input behavior for Fader 1.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_1_SEEK_TYPE: Select the seek type for Fader 1.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_2_OUTPUT: Select the output behavior for Fader 2.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_2_INPUT: Select the input behavior for Fader 2.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_2_SEEK_TYPE: Select the seek type for Fader 2.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_3_OUTPUT: Select the output behavior for Fader 3.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_3_INPUT: Select the input behavior for Fader 3.
FADER_BEHAVIOR.DOC_FADER_3_SEEK_TYPE: Select the seek type for Fader 3.
